message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love.
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand that $150 is a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about we settle on $135?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. How about we meet at $125? I really think that's a fair price for this product.
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob! I can do $130, but that's as low as I can go. It's still a great deal for you, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I'm still a bit far from my budget, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle again. How about we settle on $127.50? I think that's a fair price for the product.

I'm getting a bit tired of going back and forth, but I'm still interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you at $126. I think that's the lowest I'm willing to go.

I understand you're getting tired of going back and forth, Bob, but I'm not willing to give up yet! I can do $128, and that's as low as I can go. It's still a great deal for you, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I've reached my limit, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $126 one last time. If you can't meet me here, I'll have to consider buying from John.
